name: Alternative Markdown Converter
description: Alternative Markdown Converter. H A I L Lenny.

name: Api Key Helper
description: Make it easier to rotate multiple API keys for the same API. H A I L Lenny.

name: Asset Repo Manager
description: Manage additional asset repositories. H A I L Lenny.

name: Auto Focus
description: Automatically give focus to chat input when starting to type. H A I L Lenny.

name: Backups Browser
description: Browse and restore your chat backups from within SillyTavern. H A I L Lenny.

name: Change Message Name
description: Click on the name on a chat message to change it. H A I L Lenny.

name: Char Switch
description: Adds a context menu with last used characters to Character Management button. H A I L Lenny.

name: ChatChat
description: Don't use this.

name: Chat Drawer
description: Adds a new drawer to the main navigation with the current character's chats. H A I L Lenny.

name: Chat Search
description: Search through all your chats, across characters and SillyTavern accounts. H A I L Lenny.

name: Codex
description: Requires File Explorer extension and Files plugin. Allows highlighting WI entries in Chat, creating clickable maps, and more. H A I L Lenny.

name: ComfyUI
description: A copy of the Stable Diffusion extension modified to use ComfyUI. H A I L Lenny.

name: CSS Snippet Manager
description: Adds a UI to manage custom CSS snippets. H A I L Lenny.

name: Custom Code Languages
description: Provides slash commands to add custom languages (syntax highlighting) to the codeblocks shown in chat messages. H A I L Lenny.

name: Custom Models
description: Add custom model names to OpenAI, Claude, and Google/Gemini connections in SillyTavern. H A I L Lenny.

name: Custom Title
description: Add slash command to set a custom title for the SillyTavern tab / window. H A I L Lenny.

name: Home Link Button
description: When using the Discord Inspired Theme, click on the SillyTavern logo to go back to the landing page. H A I L Lenny.

name: Everything
description: Access every exported variable and function from SillyTavern and installed extensions. H A I L Lenny.

name: Evil Slash Command
description: Adds /js slash command to evaluate JavaScript. H A I L Lenny.

name: Export HTML
description: Export chat history as an HTML document. H A I L Lenny.

name: Extension Manager
description: Extension settings, management of installed extensions and plugins, and extension and plugin catalogue in a tabbed view right in the extension drawer. H A I L Lenny.

name: External Editor
description: Open any textarea in your local text editor. H A I L Lenny.

name: Favicon
description: Custom favicons. H A I L Lenny.

name: File Explorer
description: File Explorer for SillyTavern directories. H A I L Lenny.

name: Files Plugin Api
description: API class and slash commands to work with the Files server plugin. H A I L Lenny.

name: Get ST App-Context
description: Access ST App context in STscripts. Open your browser's dev tools (F12) to see what data is available. H A I L Lenny.

name: Go Read A Book
description: Read your chat / story like a book. H A I L Lenny.

name: Group Expressions
description: Enable multiple expression sprites in Group Chats. H A I L Lenny.

name: Input History
description: Use Alt+Up or Alt+Down in the input box to go through your last inputs and /commands. H A I L Lenny.

name: Keyboard
description: Assign custom keyboard shortcuts (QRs, built-in actions) and disable default shortcuts. H A I L Lenny.

name: LALib
description: Library of helpful STScript commands for SillyTavern. H A I L Lenny.

name: LA Theme
description: Lenny's Theme! H A I L Lenny.

name: Landing Page
description: Customize the ST Landing page. H A I L Lenny.

name: Local Storage Helper
description: A quick way to export and import your browser's localStorage (i.e., the settings that are saved only in your browser and are not applied when you open SillyTavern in a different browser or on a different device.) H A I L Lenny.

name: LogoutButton
description: Adds a logout button to the top menu. H A I L Lenny.

name: Lore Variables
description: Variable manager for lorebook / world info entries. H A I L Lenny.

name: Message Actions
description: Execute Quick Replies on specific messages. H A I L Lenny.

name: Message Interactivity
description: Adds some macros for interacting with messages when they are first rendered. H A I L Lenny.

name: Message Variables
description: Variables specific to a message and swipe. H A I L Lenny.

name: Mistake
description: Well, that was a catastrophic mistake. H A I L Lenny.

name: More Flexible Continues
description: More flexibility for continues. H A I L Lenny.

name: Navigate Chat
description: Adds slash commands to navigate through existing chat messages. H A I L Lenny.

name: Not Just Buttons
description: Display Quick Replies as dropdowns or toggles. H A I L Lenny.

name: Novel Mode
description: Edit the whole chat as a single document. H A I L Lenny.

name: Packager
description: Creates packages of characters and chats. H A I L Lenny.

name: Parallax Backgrounds
description: Makes yer wallpaper bounce up n down. H A I L Lenny.

name: Plugin Manager
description: Install, update, and uninstall server plugins from the client. H A I L Lenny.

name: Quick Branch Switch
description: Quickly switch between branches of a conversation. H A I L Lenny.

name: Quick Replies Drawer
description: Gives QRs its own Top Menu drawer like they deserve! H A I L Lenny.

name: QuickReply Manager
description: Quickly reply manager. H A I L Lenny.

name: Quick Reply Switch
description: Easily toggle global and chat-specific QuickReply sets. H A I L Lenny.

name: Quip Quiver
description: Quick access to little blocks of text to paste into the currently focused text input. H A I L Lenny.

name: Regex Slash
description: Adds a /regex slash command to do regex replaces on any textarea in SillyTavern. H A I L Lenny.

name: Send Button
description: Custom send buttons! H A I L Lenny.

name: Slash Command Changes
description: Toast new / removed / changed commands. H A I L Lenny.

name: STAHP Extension
description: Control ST from outside ST

name: StreamRegex
description: Register regex that trigger Quick Replies through automation IDs during response streaming. H A I L Lenny.

name: Swipe Annotations
description: Highlight text in your swipes, add notes, and mark swipes as favorites. H A I L Lenny.

name: Swipe Combiner
description: Combine multiple swipes into one. H A I L Lenny.

name: Toast History
description: Keep a history of all toast notifications. H A I L Lenny.

name: Tooltips
description: Show tooltips immediately. H A I L Lenny.

name: Travel Screen
description: Trigger an animated line travelling to checkpoints over an image, and set it to music! H A I L Lenny.

name: Trigger Cards
description: Displays small interactive portraits of all group chat members on top of the chat input bar. H A I L Lenny.

name: User Settings Test
description: Don't use this! Testing a different user settings layout. H A I L Lenny.

name: User Swipes
description: Enable swiping on user messages (last or second to last message in chat). H A I L Lenny.

name: Variable Viewer
description: Displays local and global variables in a window. Helpful while working on ST scripts. H A I L Lenny.

name: Video Backgrounds
description: A slightly hacky way to use video backgrounds in SillyTavern. H A I L Lenny.

name: Wizard
description: Adds STscript commands to show a configurable Wizard to guide the user step-by-step through a list of pages. H A I L Lenny.

name: Word Frequency
description: A nice graph of frequently occuring words in your chat so far. H A I L Lenny.

name: World Info Drawer
description: Moves the World Info into its own drawer in the main navigation. H A I L Lenny.

name: World Info Info
description: See which WorldInfo entries were active in the last generated message. H A I L Lenny.

name: World Info Macros
description: Adds macros for all WorldInfo entries by UID and Title/Memo. H A I L Lenny.

name: WorldInfo Presets
description: Presets for multiple active WI books. H A I L Lenny.

name: WorldInfo Switch
description: Right click on World Info icon to quick-toggle lorebooks and entries! H A I L Lenny.
